title.narrative: 2020 COVID-19 Response in the Slums of Kenya

description.narrative: Precautionary measures like social distancing are not an option for urban slum residents who live shoulder to shoulder in crowded households, and the lack of access to water for washing, healthcare facilities, and accurate information means that containment will be nearly impossible should the virus take hold in the slums. SHOFCO has jumped into action as more support is urgently needed to reach and prevent devastation in Kenya’s informal settlements.
